snippet.title: Chasm: The Rift - Grim Borough | Mod | 4K60 | Longplay Full Game Mod Walkthrough No Commentary
snippet.description:
Full game mod longplay of Grim Borough, a 2021 mod for Chasm: The Rift, a 1997 retro shooter. Developed by Max "Jerry" Rafa, with the help of Re-fund (AKA racx_00). Here played at the same settings as Cursed Land (second mod for Chasm I've recorded), which means 4K60 resolution, highest possible settings, max FOV, the works. Recorded at 4K60 H.265 NVENC codec via OBS. GOG remastered version of the game used here.

Link to the mod: https://www.moddb.com/games/chasm-the-rift/addons/grim-borough-for-chasm-the-rift

My own GOG Affiliate link for Chasm: The Rift (Remastered version) on GOG store: https://adtr.co/aOVz4Y

Link to my 4K60 longplay of Chasm: The Rift - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JXUqfi9hbhk

19/8/1997
The Timestrikers have cropped up yet again in Medieval Scandinavia, this time in a small platoon warping the natives into horrific mutants and even raising the buried dead.
You, Corporal Alexei, have been chosen to eliminate this alien threat by any means possible. Grab your rifle, slip into your combat armour and finish off the last remaining Timestrikers.

5 Secret supply caches have been scattered across the three sectors you'll be clearing.
Keep your eyes peeled for them as they're well hidden and will help you significantly in your mission!


























































===========================================================================================
#retro #longplay #retrogaming #fps #shooter #quake #doom #boomershooter #chasm #doom2 #quake1 #retrogaming #retroshooter #chasm #chasmtherift #mod
